docs.snippet: A team physician has recommended elbow surgery to repair a partly torn medial collateral ligament for pitcher Jeremy Hefner, who was a key member of the Mets’ rotation earlier this season....

docs.snippet: The random slaying of an Australia native who came to the U.S. to play baseball and earn a college degree has touched hearts in the U.S. and beyond, as tens of thousands of dollars streamed into a fund designed to help Chris Lane's parents bring t...
docs.lead_paragraph: The random slaying of an Australia native who came to the U.S. to play baseball and earn a college degree has touched hearts in the U.S. and beyond, as tens of thousands of dollars streamed into a fund designed to help Chris Lane's parents bring their son back home.

headline.main: Fund for Slain Australian Player Tops $100K
headline.print_headline: Fund for Slain Australian Player Tops $100K

docs.snippet: A fund to aid the family of Christopher Lane, the 23-year-old Australian university student police say was murdered "for the fun of it" by three bored Oklahoma teenagers, has surpassed $113,000, according to the "gofundme" website....

docs.snippet: An Ohio prisoner who was beaten with baseball bats by his fellow inmates has died, becoming the third man killed in just the past year at an overcrowded state prison in northeastern Ohio, officials said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Ohio prisoner who was beaten with baseball bats by his fellow inmates has died, becoming the third man killed in just the past year at an overcrowded state prison in northeastern Ohio, officials said on Thursday.

headline.main: Beaten Ohio Inmate Dies in Prison's Third Killing in a Year
headline.print_headline: Beaten Ohio Inmate Dies in Prison's Third Killing in a Year
